[b][size=medium]XMPP Chat Service Now Live[/size][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF1493]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has recommended those wishing to join an XMPP chat service may try [url=https://hacker.im/register]Hacker.im[/url]. The chatroom can be found by searching the server, "[color=#FFFFFF]im.hacker.im[/color]" and those looking to register can do so [url=https://hacker.im/register]here[/url]. [size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5735745]>>thread[/url][/size]

[b][size=medium]Hacker.IM Graphics Battle[/size][/b]
A graphics battle is being held to determine the new web design for the recently announced [b]Hacker.IM[/b]. Although typical competitions usually run for one month, this round will be especially difficult having only two weeks to complete and submit your designs. The current web design can be viewed [url=https://hacker.im/register]here[/url]. The winner of the competition will recieve the much coveted Graphic Master award along with bragging rights for this month. [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5738473][size=xx-small]>>thread[/size][/url]
[spoiler][img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/graphic-master.png[/img][/spoiler]

[list][b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5735745][b]Hacker.IM XMPP[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
You can now register and use Hacker.IM XMPP thanks to [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/url] and [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1406453][color=#00AAFF]Escrow[/color][/url]. Hacker.IM offers file transfers, group chats, OTR, and more. Check it out, XMPP is some great technology that the world is missing out on - including me.[/list][/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5727953][b]Cryptocurrency Guide and Tutorial Mega Thread[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2172949][b][color=#00AAFF]Eagerkid[/color][/b][/url]
You know how you always wanted to get into cryptocurrency but just couldn't find the right time? Well now is your only chance - now or never people! Eagerkid has created a mega thread consisting of multiple ICO/coin reviews, regulation news, etc. This is going to be your go-to to learn about what's happened over the years and recent months.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5735112][b]Ethereum First: Investment Product Opens for Trading on Nasdaq Exchange[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3229947][color=white][b]Baker[/b][/color][/url]
CoinShares is launching an exchange-traded note (ETN) for ether which for simplicity sake means investors on the Nasdaq Stockholm exchange can purchase ETN of Ether (Ethereum) and also Bitcoin (since 2015) which is basically a method of investments. ETN functions similar to exchange-traded funds (ETF) bu just provide a single asset instead of a grouping of assets like ETF.[/list][/list]

[/list][/list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5738473][b]Graphic Master Battle == October '17 == Hacker.IM Web Design[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][b][color=white]iHydra[/color][/b][/url]
Novica, Maxim, and iHydra back at it again with another Graphic Master award contest. This time, it's a web design for Hacker.IM's login/registration page. Got what it takes to be a master of art? You sure? Then get started, deadline is right around the corner![/list][/list]

[align=center]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/leHIhiL.png[/img]
[color=1E90FF][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778]oxid[/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]

[hr]

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: Hello and welcome to the 365 edition of the Hack Forums News. Today we have the member, Oxid with us. Would you like to give any shout-outs before we get started?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: Just Not Your Average Orange!

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: What does your username mean and how did you come up with it?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: My name is a compound in which oxygen is bonded to one or more electropositive atoms. Just like how I am a compound in which I will bond with one or more individuals in the community.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: You have been a member for just a few months now, but you have already made a name for yourself. For example, you are not currently leading a sector in Dawn. Congrats on that. How did that come about?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: I am currently leading a sector in Dawn for cybersecurity. I just applied and ka$h got banned and I said I'd be willing to teach to Night Fury! I figured it'd be a great time to do cybersec research on my own and professionally as well. I've created some threads in the sub-forum already.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: What makes your sector unique compared to others that have been created on HF before? In the future would you like to see a group focused on cybersecurity?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: I don't see other cybersecurity groups, except maybe Revelation which is under Torque. I'm in that group now and there are some useful resources. I wouldike to see a group focused on cyberserity, but it seems like there's a lot of people just selling groups and buying them. I like Night Fury as a group leader a lot as well. He does a lot of good things and really makes sure that his group is a comfortable and fitting place for all members. I don't know how the other leaders are, but Night Fury is really proactive in making sure I enjoy my stay and the sub-forum is great. Dawn is great.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: What advice would you give someone looking to pursue a career in cybersecurity? In this day in age, it is super vital to keep all of our information secure. For let's say, someone in High School about to get into college or someone actually majoring in the field, what is one huge tip you think would be the most helpful in successfully learning something that they are passionate about in many of the different sub-categories in cybersecurity?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: Hm. I'd say if your university offers cybersecurity courses, I'd say go for it. A lot of people think computer science = hackerman. Not true. A lot of people don't code with security in mind. I'd say try to get certificates such as the Security+ and the CCNA (networking for Cisco). Also just learning the fundamentals would be important. Personal opsec and a good attitude to adapt to change is important. Cybersecurity is always changing so one should always be updated. Let's come back to this.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: This may come off as a weird, random question but it is something I'd like to ask. I am not sure what music you are familiar with or what you like to listen to and that's okay. What I wanted to ask was what keeps you motivated? This question is related to music because a lot of people use it as motivation. A lot of lyrics relate to those who listen to it. What motivates you? It could be a movie, person, even music. What is the one thing that keeps you going, despite possibly being down at one point in time?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: I like all genres. In particular metal and rock. What keeps me motivated? I love cybersecurity and pentesting. My lust for knowledge keeps me motivated. Some artists I like are Tame Impala, Led Zeppelin, Pink Floyd, and recently I've been listening to Dream on Dreamer. Although I also like heavier stuff like Mors Principium Est. I also listen to underground hip hop such as Flatbush Zombies, The Underachievers, and $uicideboy$ (I've seen them live.)

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: I will admit that music is a great escape to things. I also enjoyed your comment on wanting to learn more. I'm sure then from the underground hip-hop you hear more of the "emo" "punk" kind of style of songs now. For example, you said $uicideBoy$, which I also listen to. Some of their lyrics have things that may be disturbing to others, but those in the mindset of Ruby and Scrim (the two in the group for those who don't know) can relate to them. Another example is Lil Peep who has lyrics that he sang, 'I got hoes now and I got some dough now. But they don't wanna hear that they want that real sh*t. They want that drug talk, that "I can't feel" sh*t' Which I believe is completely true. Anyone who listens to underground can relate to the lyrics than most of the dumb, mainstream rap that you hear on the radio and popular charts. What is your take on music and depression?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: I think music is a good escape, but I've never been depressed before so it's hard for me to relate. Never been chronically depressed that is. I don't want to deindividualize anyone's problems.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: Besides things that are computer related what are things you like to do?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: I'd like to give Soulmate a shout out too, but yes. I like to skate. I skate street and bowls. I also enjoy shredding on the guitar (I have two electrics.) I play metal and I also play classical piano. I also quite enjoy sexual intercourse. I'm always looking for sex, might be addicted to pleasure or something. Weird.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: Jeebie sleebies that last part cracked me up. Pretty sure you're the only one to ever say that in an interview. Well, if you are looking for a partner I can hook you up with Froggy. :eyes emoji: (Please don't neg me, Froggster). Maybe you can make a video of your doing the killer riff in Sons of Winter and Stars.
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: Haha. OH is that WINTERSUN? I unfortunately don't have my guitar with me right now. I'm living outside of home, but I'd like to. I'll have you know! I went to a Wintersun concert! I went to their 1st NA tour.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0FD6A7][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: The time has gone by pretty fast. I had a lot of fun interviewing you. Sadly that is all we have time for today. Are there any final words you would like to say to the viewers?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3680778][color=#ffffff][b]oxid[/b][/color][/url]: I'd like to thank you for taking the time to interview me, and I also wanted to express how grateful I am for the Hackforums community. Even though sometimes it can be quite frustrating to scroll through some of the IDIOTS' posts, but I actively try and mentally block stuff like that out when possible. See ya around the forums!

[/align][/spoiler][/align]
 
[hr]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/url][/align]
[b][color=white]A Hand-Full of Rivers Contribute to a Large Portion of Plastic Pollution[/color][/b] 
Researchers based in Germany at the Helmholtz Centre for Environmental Research and the Weihenstephan-Triesdorf University of Applied Science have been studying the rates of which we dump plastic into the ocean. They are coming to believe that just ten rivers, which are all located in Asia, are responsible for unloading just shy of 4 million tonnes of plastic waste into international waters. Before this study, it was known that over a fifth of the plastic debris in the ocean comes straight from human freighters illegally dumping. The team went to work analyzing plastic concentrations in 240 separate samples, from 79 sites, spanning 40 rivers. The team concluded with “Reducing plastic loads by 50% in the 10 top-ranked rivers would reduce the total river-based load to the sea by 45%,” As unlikely as I know it is for anything to actually happen about this, a boy can hope.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://cosmosmagazine.com/biology/just-10-rivers-to-blame-for-millions-of-tonnes-of-ocean-plastic]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Obesity Rates are Balooning[/color][/b] 
This is going to be a quick one. While we may not be in the lead anymore, Mexico now holds that honor, the obesity rates in the United States are nothing to be scoffed at. A study conducted by the National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey found that the obesity rates in the last fifteen years have grown over thirty percent in middle-aged individuals. They also found that a majority of Hispanic and non-Hispanic black women are obese in their research. It is also worth noting that this study used data that only spanned until late 2016, we could be in an even worse place by now.   [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-10-13/-middle-age-spread-is-true-obesity-study-finds]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Trees are Saving the Lives of Children[/color][/b] 
A study, recently published in  Nature, gathered conclusive evidence that trees being situated upstream from a community reduces the risk of diarrheal disease. Diarrheal disease is a considerable risk to children in smaller communities; the World Health Organization estimates it kills more than a half million children every year. They scoured over data from 35 separate countries and 300,000 health records. Their research also bolsters a previous study conducted on the relationship between decreasing forestation and a rise in diarrheal disease. [i][size=x-small][url=https://saludmovil.com/trees-improve-sanitation-child-death-rates-down/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/G4DefDi.png[/img][/url][/align]
[b][color=white]Catastrophic Breeding Season Hits Adelie Penguins[/color][/b] 
Just two Adelie penguins have survived this year's breeding season at their colony in the east Antartic. The loss of life was caused by there being an extraordinary amount of ice in the region, meaning the penguins would need to travel further than usual for sustenance. This year is the second severe one in two years; none of the chicks survived the breeding season of 2015. With news of these two devastating years close to one another, conservation groups are stepping up to the plate. The WWF is calling for a ban on fishing in the area to eliminate competition and give a dew species of tuxedo-wearing flightless birds a chance, not just the Adelie. Their proposal is scheduled to be heard on October 16 by a panel of 25 members.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/science-environment-41608722?ocid=socialflow_facebook&ns_mchannel=social&ns_campaign=bbcnews&ns_source=facebook]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]The Tumultuous Tomato Conundrum [/color][/b] 
Food wastage isn't only a problem that plagues the United States; it has affected most modern countries. This very story comes to us from a farm in Queensland, Australia. A recent study found that as many as 87% of tomatoes produced there were discarded for not exhibiting a certain color and shape that we all expect to see when strolling down a grocery store aisle. The Australian government estimates waste such as this costs them somewhere in the vicinity of $20 billion dollars annually. The farms aren't the ones that should have the finger of blame point at, however, a co-author of the paper Singh-Peterson said: “But the standards supermarkets impose on farmers are very stringent, and the farms have to meet those standards or the supermarkets will just choose another supplier.”  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2017/oct/13/you-say-tomato-retailers-say-waste-research-finds-produce-problem]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/Jvg81mQ.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Google Home Mini Review[/color][/b]
The Home Mini is a voice-controlled speaker that can be utilized to play music, control brilliant home devices, answer random data questions, add things to a shopping list, make date-book arrangements, or play video on a Chromecast-empowered screen. As of late, Google added the capacity to put telephone calls on the Home speakers, and also utilize them to find your telephone in the event that you've lost it someplace in your home. (It is on the couch. It's dependable on the sofa.) 
The Home Mini is additionally an immediate reaction to Amazon's uncontrollably mainstream Echo Dot, which offers for around $50 and gives a considerable lot of a similar savvy speaker capacities. Like the Echo Dot, the Home Mini is sufficiently little and sufficiently shoddy to put in any room of your home, covering your home with a continually listening voice-controlled PC. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/10/11/16453788/google-home-mini-smart-speaker-review]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Apple Co-Founder Steve Wozniak Launches His Own Online Tech Education Platform[/color][/b]
Steve Wozniak, who helped to establish Apple with Steve Jobs, is propelling another online tech instruction stage he's calling Woz U, which is intended to advance innovation employments and the abilities required to enter the business. After some time, Wozniak would like to extend the activity to incorporate upwards of 30 physical areas around the globe and courses on everything from programming designing and data innovation to portable application improvement and cybersecurity, among others. It's hazy whether courses will be offered for nothing, or whether Woz U anticipates charging for any component of the online training stage. The site does not state. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/10/13/16474170/apple-steve-wozniak-woz-u-launch-tech-education-online-university]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews/Tsundere.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Epic Sues Two Fortnite Cheaters[/color][/b] 
Recent reports say that Epic Games, creators of the battle royal genre game, Fortnite, are suing to players that have cheated on their servers. In their first statement regarding cheaters and hackers, Epic Games state, "Thousands had already been banned and warning of more to come." In their adventure of making the game more fun and enjoyable for their players, looking for ways to stop cheaters is one way to make that adventure progress positively. With that being said, two specific players are allegedly getting sued for their actions, despite being banned. With their names now public, players Brandon Boom and Charles Vraspir are being sued for the following, "Copyright infringement, breach of contract, and other such bits of illegality, all as a result of cheating. " After making new alternative accounts after being banned multiple times, each of these players still continued cheating even after the bans and warnings given to them. With those actions of going against the company, Epic Games finally decided to take legal action. No numbers have been discussed, but Epic is trying to make the two pay for any profit they may have made during the duration of their cheating spree. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/epic-sues-two-fortnite-cheaters/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Overwatch Changes Mercy yet Again on PTR[/color][/b] 
New changes for Mercy on Overwatch's PTR server is imminent. Just after her recent changes with her kit, she will be getting some more changes. Blizzard has done a lot for Mercy in the past few months, what is new this time? In the September update that changed Mercy's ultimate from her resurrect to Valkyrie, Mercy was able to reset the timer of her new ability (old ultimate) resurrect whenever she ulted (Valkyrie). In the recent PTR update, the cooldown will not be reduced or reset, but rather the range of the ultimate will be greater in hopes for, "a better perk". Geof Goodman who is one of the lead developers of Overwatch state, "For example, in the past if you want to res two targets with Valkyrie, you had to first res one target, then Ult (causing the cooldown to reset), then res the other target. With this new change you can now hit Valkyrie first, fly in quickly, and res two targets instantly." One last change with Mercy is her guardian angel ability. You now have the option to let go early, activate the spacebar and then slowly fly past your teammate. In a way to describe it, it is like using your teammate as a slingshot. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/overwatch-changes-mercy-yet-again-on-ptr/1100-6454015/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Discord Launches 'Verified Servers' for Game Developers and Publishers[/color][/b] 
This latest service being offered by Discord was offered to over 100 different game companies. Two of those companies included Microsoft and even PUBG. What exactly is a verified server? Well, it's a way for game developers to share news and update its players, as well gives you a chance to interact with the game developers. Similiar to the partnered Discord servers, pretty much these game developers are given their own Discord server to run. May sound a little silly since anyone can make their own server anyway, though, right? However, what will make the server different besides the developers being present is what you get, or rather the perks of being a verified server. If your server is verified, you will get the chance to have your own custom invite URL. For example, the alpha Tyler1 has "discord.gg/tyler1" for his server. In addition, there will be a blue check mark next to the server name, which is similar to other websites that offer a verification service to prove that that person is who they say they are. With perks also comes responsibility. In order to keep a server verified, there are rules and guidelines these companies must follow. First, they must hire (or recruit) moderators to keep the server a fun, safe environment for everyone. Second, verification must be set to medium which means that in order to participate in discussions you need to be a member of the Discord for five minutes. Lastly, the scanning of messages option will be on to prevent any lewd (nudity) photos and images to be posted in the channels. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/discord-launches-verified-servers-for-game-developers-and-publishers/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Here's the Free Pokemon and Items You Can Get in Pokemon Sun and Moon Right Now[/color][/b] 
Once again Pokemon is doing their monthly free prize giveaway for their fans. Possibly the last for Sun and Moon considering the approach of their latest game, Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon.  November 17 is on its way and the new games will be here quicker than you know it. No rush though, because Nintendo is doing one last huge prize giveaway. With that being said, compared to the five or six mega stones that they usually giveaway, they are giving away batches of things not obtainable in the game. However, for some codes, you may need to go out of your way to go to a store. Keep on reading to learn more! Also, this event is going on until Oct. 31 so if you do not want to miss this chance, now is your time. In addition, throughout that time frame from now to Oct. 31, different events will be taking place so you will need to act fast because some last only a few days! Credits to GameSpot for the information that will be provided next. Everything after the semicolon WAS NOT WRITTEN BY OUR HF NEWS WRITERS! (Credit will be given below).

Input these codes to get your mega stones and characters:

[b]INTIMIDATE[/b]
[list][*]Mawilite
[*]Beedrillite
[*]Audinite
[*]Medichamite[/list]

[b]AZUL[/b]
[list][*]Pidgeotite
[*]Steelixite
[*]Heracronite
[*]Houndoominite[/list]

[b]MATSUBUSA[/b]
[list][*]Sceptilite
[*]Blazikenite
[*]Swampertite
[*]Cameruptite
[*]Banettite[/list]

[b]SABLEVOLANT[/b]
[list][*]Tyranitarite
[*]Abomasite
[*]Manectite
[*]Aggronite[/list]

[b]POYONG[/b]
[list][*]Galladite
[*]Gardevoirite
[*]Lopunnite
[*]Diancite[/list]

[b]DRACHE[/b]
[list][*]Ampharosite
[*]Altarianite
[*]Latiosite
[*]Latiasite[/list]

[b]Pokemon Events[/b]

[b]Charizard -- Ends Oct. 14[/b]
Players in the US can pick up a free download code for Charizard from the electronics department in Target stores. The popular Fire-type Pokemon comes at level 50, is equipped with the Red Card item, and knows the moves Dragon Dance, Flare Blitz, Fly, and Earthquake. As with other download codes, you need to input your code via Mystery Gift to receive Charizard. The distribution runs until October 14, and you have until February 4, 2018 to redeem your code.

[b]Marshadow -- Ends Oct. 23[/b]
For a very limited time, players can pick up a free download code for the Mythical Pokemon Marshadow. Those in the US can get the code from GameStop, while players in the UK will have to visit "participating retailers." This is the first legitimate way Sun and Moon players can obtain the rare Fighting/Ghost-type, which comes at level 50 and is equipped with Marshadium Z. It also knows the attacks Spectral Thief, Close Combat, Force Palm, and Shadow Ball.

[b]Pikachu[/b]
To celebrate the release of the Pokemon series' 20th anniversary film, Pokemon The Movie: I Choose You, The Pokemon Company is giving away six different versions of Ash's Pikachu for Sun and Moon. To receive a Pikachu, enter the code PIKACHU20 in Mystery Gift. However, you can only receive one of the six Pikachu, and the version you get depends on when you enter the code. The full Pikachu distribution schedule is below.

September 19-25: Original hat (DONE)
September 26-October 2: Hoenn hat (DONE)
October 3-9: Sinnoh hat (DONE)
October 10-16: Unova hat
October 17-23: Kalos hat
October 24-30: Alola hat
Celebi -- Ends Sep. 21, 2018

Players who purchase either Pokemon Gold or Silver from the 3DS Eshop by September 21, 2018 will receive a bonus download code for the Mythical Pokemon Celebi. The code can be redeemed in Pokemon Sun, Moon, Ultra Sun, or Ultra Moon. We've outlined the steps you need to take to find and redeem the code here.

[b]Magearna[/b]
Unlike other Mythical Pokemon, the Steel/Fairy-type Magearna is available not through Mystery Gift, but via a QR code. After defeating the Elite Four and completing the main story, you can use the QR Scanner feature to scan the below code. After doing so, visit the Antiques shop in Hau'oli City and pick your Magearna up from the deliveryman waiting there. The Mythical Pokemon comes at level 50 and knows the moves Fleur Cannon, Flash Cannon, Lucky Chant, and Helping Hand.

[align=center]QR for Magearna
[img]https://i.imgur.com/nbNdakb.png[/img][/align]

(Source for all the information provided above, https://www.gamespot.com/articles/heres-the-free-pokemon-and-items-you-can-get-in-po/1100-6453941/) [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/heres-the-free-pokemon-and-items-you-can-get-in-po/1100-6453941/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]


[align=center][sp=Gaming Video of the Week][yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=daIFi9xmTtQ[/yt][/sp][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1400449][img]https://imgur.com/zSC8Zsp.png[/img][/url][/align]
[b][color=white]JPMorgan Earns $6.7 Billion Profit Thanks to Main Street[/color][/b] 
This past Thursday, JPMorgan Chase reported a quarterly profit of $6.7 billion, crushing most industry predictions. The increase in profit appears to be due to a transfer in focus from corporate banking to consumer banking. By putting more focus on "lending for credit cards, cars, mortgages, and taking in deposits," JPMorgan Chase was able to increase profits by 16% in its consumer and business division, while it's corporate division suffered a 13% decrease in revenue. The earning results JPMorgan Chase posted are on track with the overall US banking industry which has been steadily growing for several years. JPM stock is up more than 12% in 2017 and nearly passing its current all-time high. I have seen many discussions lately about how cryptocurrencies are killing banks, however, as we see in the news banks are enjoying a high growth rate with a promising future. Leave a reply to this thread on how you think the banking industry will change in the coming years. [i][size=x-small][url=http://money.cnn.com/2017/10/12/investing/jpmorgan-chase-earnings/index.html?iid=SF_LN]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Alphabet's Waymo Moonshot May Soon Be A Robocar Business[/color][/b] 
In a consumer transportation industry that is becoming more and more dominated by ride-sharing services like Uber and Lyft, we see other tech giants looking to find a place for themselves. For over eight years now Google-owned Waymo has been working on a self-driving car called the Moonshot. It wasn't clear until recently what Waymo had in mind for their self-driver, but as of information the company reported last Thursday, it appears they are planning on entering the ride-sharing industry. With the majority of expenses for ride-sharing companies going to the drivers, moving over to self-driving cars will help Waymo and other companies in the industry to turn more of their revenue into profit. Google has said that we should look forward to seeing these cars on the road as early as July 2018. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/alanohnsman/2017/10/12/alphabets-waymo-moonshot-may-soon-be-a-robocar-business/#4c45c01e752f]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=1][color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/3-301.png[/img][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/Spotlight.png[/img][/url][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5738792][img=720x512]https://i.imgur.com/hmhxIxy.png[/img][/url][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5725546][img=720x512]https://i.imgur.com/5BVQyxG.png[/img][/url][/align]

[align=center][i]Want to showcase your own Battlestation (Computer Setup)? [url=https://hackforums.net/private.php?action=send&uid=561239&subject=HFN%20Battlestation&message=Here%20are%20images%20of%20my%20battlestation:%20]Submit yours now![/url][/i][/align]

[color=transparent]         [/color]
